meanings.sent1: Running every day broadens the path in the park.
meanings.sent2: The river broadens as it flows towards the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The balloon broadens as more air is blown into it.
meanings.sent4: Her smile broadens the room like sunshine breaking through clouds.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brush broadens the strokes on the canvas, creating a beautiful landscape.

meanings.definition: To increase in scope or range
meanings.sent1: Reading different genres broadens your knowledge.
meanings.sent2: Traveling to new places broadens your horizons.
meanings.sent3: Eating a variety of foods broadens your taste buds.
meanings.sent4: Learning a new language broadens your communication abilities.
meanings.sent5: Exploring diverse cultures broadens your understanding of the world.
